price: 后来我使他们苏醒，以便我知道两派中的哪一派更能计算他们所停留的时间。
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnāhum linaʿlama ayyu al-ḥiz'bayni aḥṣā limā labithū amadan
